item.description:
Host: Claire P. cell @ 603-247-0897
RAIN CANCELS THIS EVENT!

Weather permitting, I think it would be fun to go for a bike ride on the Nashua River Rail Trail. Please know that my intent is to enjoy the view of the area, and to chat along the way.   This event is meant more to have fun than to get a workout.    I thought that we would bike for about two hours, and if people are in the mood, we could plan on going  out to dinner after our ride.

We will meet at 6:00pm sharp,  at the S. Depot Rd, Hollis NH   location. Please follow these directions.   Take Route 111 West into Hollis.   When in Hollis, take Route 111A East.   The trail is next to the Amerigas propane tank.   I will have a Meetup sign.

Please remember to bring your insect repellent and plenty of fluids.

This event is at no cost! I hope to see you there!

Please RSVP or call my cell @ 603-247-0897

 

Location: S. Depot Rd, Hollis NH

Liability Release - AS A CONDITION OF ATTENDING THIS MEETUP, YOU AGREE TO hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer and her heirs, and all members and participants of this Meetup group from any and all claims for injury, illness, death, and/or property damage including those caused by negligence, ignorance, inexperience and other reasons. You also agree to assume all mental, physical, financial, and/or other risk associated with this meetup. All  meetup activities pose inherent risks and dangers. Participation in these activities is voluntary and dependent upon your own personal judgment.
item.name: Evening biking at Nashua River Rail Trail
